name: Fernando MartÌn Executive
description:
Fernando Mart√≠n Executive is a one-on-one basketball game, dedicated to NBA player Fernando Mart√≠n. This is a sequel to the popular game Fernando Mart√≠n Basket Master.

Fernando Mart√≠n was the first Spanish and first European player to play in the NBA, who tragically died in a traffic accident 3 years later at the age of 28.

The focus is on pure, unadulterated action here: just choose one- or two-player game, and presto-- you'll be out on a CGA court trying to score. Although difficulty level can be toggled ("amateur" or "NBA").
